ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] The Group from Hell
ygData.messageBody:
i bought mine in qeynos.

At 12:19 PM 7/19/00 -0400, you wrote:
>damn halana, ya sound like you had a busy/dreadful day yesterday with both
>your characters 8(
>
>knowing that your bard is in cazic, once i get the rubies i'll head there
>and await your arrival. I wont be on tonight so maybe tomorrow or day after
>we can hook up 8)
>
>btw, where can i get rubies in antonica? i dont wanna go to faydwer where i
>usually get em, gates are hard to come by since kunark came out. I cant
>seem to find any in freeport, neriak and troll city or rivervale. any tips
>on where to find them if they are available in these cities
>
>-Rakka
>-Minkin
>
>P.S. Know anyone selling yaks halana?
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Cranfill, Wendy [mailto:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, July 19, 2000 12:00 PM
>To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] The Group from Hell
>
>
>Hahaha no that was not in poor form... and frankly, things happen, and you
>sometimes need to disband the group, but you always TELL people. But wow,
>that sounds like an adventure!
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Webber, Jessica [mailto:webber@...]
> > Sent: Wednesday, July 19, 2000 9:56 AM
> > To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> > Subject: RE: [eqbards] The Group from Hell
> >
> >
> > Hmmm, I recently ditched a group during corpse retreival.
> > But lemme explain
> > why & tell me if you think this was poor form.
> >
> > I was soloing as my level 7 shaman and died in Blackburrow.
> > Upon returning
> > home I hooked up with two other young barbs who also just died in
> > Blackburrow. We agreed to group up for CR. Three others
> > joined us and I
> > got my corpse back first (it was right by the zone). As I
> > was donning my
> > patchwork one of the other naked barbs began fretting that
> > someone whom he'd
> > just consented to drag his corpse was no longer on line and
> > that he thinks
> > all his banded has been stolen. I finish looting and we head
> > in for the
> > other two corpses. The fretting barb then tells the group they died
> > somewhere underwater after falling down the tree. "Let's
> > go!" they say and
> > start heading for the tree. I don't know Blackburrow THAT
> > well so I ask if
> > anyone knows the way out once we're down there. A druid in
> > the group says
> > "Gate". Great, except two of our party are warriors.
> > Suddenly someone
> > shouts "Train!" and I and one of the warriors groupsay
> > "Zone". The two of
> > us zoned, then got an earful from the druid and fretting barb
> > who jumped
> > down the tree alone, and from the other naked barb and our
> > sixth member who,
> > not knowing who to follow, stood around and got killed by the
> > train. We
> > zoned back in and I waited for & watched over the two who
> > died by train as
> > they loot there corpses. The fretting barb by this time had
> > realized his
> > worst fears - he'd been robbed completely. Someone suggested
> > petitioning it
> > but he didn't remember the name of the person he consented.
> > I buffed up the
> > four party members still on the upper level, said farewell
> > and camped.
> >
> > Peace
> > Evulia the bard
> > Jesuwai the shaman
> >
> >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@...]
> > > Sent: Wednesday, July 19, 2000 11:33 AM
> > > To: eqbards@egroups.com
> > > Subject: Re: [eqbards] The Group from Hell
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > > --- "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@...>
> > > wrote:
> > > > But i guess after reading
> > > > the "bad mage" thread, just wanted to point out that
> > > > its never a bad class,
> > > > its almost always bad players.
> > >
> > > Sooo True.
> > >
> > > Last week I joined a pickup group in Dalnirs. We did
> > > pretty well in the Temple room so somebody suggested
> > > we go down to lvl 2. As we all landed in the pool of
> > > water, sombody got excited and pulled a nice train
> > > into the room before we got set up. THings got bad
> > > and somebody said gate -- The monk and I were left to
> > > die. Funny thing, all four casters in the group had
> > > to log at that point ...
> > > 7 deaths (6 during corpse recovery) at lvl 30 sure can
> > > ruin your night. sigh
> > >
